text: Motion
Motion

Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Here it is...!

Looks like they're
featuring Houkura prominently in the magazine!

They've dedicated quite a few pages to us...!
Hehe, the interviews were fun.

So, here's the sample of the pamphlet
where we contributed several articles!

Our photos and articles are in here!
It's amazing!

Oh wow...
Seeing it come together like this is really moving...

Hehe...
The front cover is quite something too...

"For track members who want to learn art, and art club
members who want to try running, neither dream is given up..."

"A school that supports students new challenges"...
The feature article on the front cover turned out nicely too!
Yes! / Yeah...! / Oh yeah...! / Yes...

We took a lot of photos too.
It would've been nice to showcase them all...!

We're not in there...
but that's obvious.

Yes...
However, indeed here...

Yes!
There are also some special photos for the cover!
Where the vice-President and track team are running together.

Even though it's just their silhouettes lit by the sunset...
you can tell they're having fun laughing.

...It might be tough for the vice-captains from now on,
but I hope they'll do their best.

Yes...
I'm sure...

I hope everyone we've met at school and the new students
who see this will be able to take a step forward.
Yeah, I hope so...
